title: Kifta and Potatoes with Tahini Sauce

Ingredients.9: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed

Ingredients.10: 5  potatoes, peeled and sliced into rounds

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Combine lamb, onion, parsley, salt, allspice, and pepper in a large bowl. Roll meat into 2 1/2-inch long pieces and arrange in a baking pan.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.

Directions.4: While meat is cooking, heat vegetable oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add potatoes; fry until lightly golden, about 5 minutes. Set aside on paper towels to drain excess oil. Sprinkle with salt.

Directions.5: Remove lamb from the oven; drain and discard any fat from meat. Leave oven on.

Directions.6: Combine garlic, lemon juice, water, tahini, salt, and pepper in a food processor until smooth. Set tahini sauce aside.

Directions.7: Arrange potatoes on top of lamb in the baking dish and pour tahini sauce on top. Drizzle with olive oil. Return the baking pan to the oven.

Directions.8: Bake in the preheated oven until lamb is no longer pink and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 150 degrees F (65 degrees C), about 30 minutes more.
